name: Eternal Desert
description:
A submission for the Low-Rez Jam 2020.  Follow two different characters as they journey through death valley. There are some issues with the Audio in the web version, Windows and Mac hopefully do not have this issue.

Total playtime of 5-10 minutes.

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys to MOVE

Spacebar to INTERACT

Z to CONSUME

Purchase snacks at gas station vending machines, CONSUME when your character expresses a desire to do so. Travel right to progress the story. INTERACT when you see a "?"

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Inspired by the story of the "Death Valley Germans" - more (excellent reading) here:

https://www.otherhand.org/home-page/search-and-rescue/the-hunt-for-the-death-val...

Music by "HOTDOG PRODUCTIONS"

https://smellslikehotdogs.bandcamp.com/

Art and Programming by me.
